snippet: An opinion by a legal group advising the European Commission concludes that the proposed tax “exceeds member states’ jurisdiction for taxation” and “is discriminatory and likely to lead to distortion of competition.”
abstract: An opinion by a legal group advising the European Commission concludes that the proposed tax “exceeds member states’ jurisdiction for taxation” and “is discriminatory and likely to lead to distortion of competition.”

headline.main: European Plan for Transaction Tax Runs Into Legal Hurdle
